key.name: binding
key.description: View current processes and monitor system state.

key.name: name
key.summary: The name of the keyboard shortcut to open the MATE System Monitor
key.description: This is the name of the keyboard shortcut to open the MATE System Monitor. This name will be shown in the keyboard shortcut preferences dialog.

key.name: action
key.description: Command used to open the MATE System Monitor.

key.name: binding
key.description: Binding to force a window to close.

key.name: name
key.summary: The name of the keyboard shortcut to force a window to close
key.description: This is the name of the keyboard shortcut to force a window to close. This name will be shown in the keyboard shortcut preferences dialog.

key.name: action
key.description: Command used to force a window to close.

key.name: name
key.summary: The name of the keyboard shortcut to toggle nightvision mode
key.description: This is the name of the keyboard shortcut to toggle nightvision mode. This name will be shown in the keyboard shortcut preferences dialog.

key.name: action
key.description: Command used to turn nightvision mode on or off.
